column1: Kata Robata////I found this place one day when I was yelping for a place to eat ramen because I was craving for some. And man I was glad to encountered this place! Their spicy soy ramen is hands down
column2: one of the BEST ramen I've ever had. Their escolar and unagi pieces were very good and well presented. I have to give it a 4 stars because the food takes forever to come out even when it isn't even busy..
